sources.title: Con Man | Full Movie | Action Crime Drama | Justin Baldoni | Mark Hamill
sources.description:
Con Man - The true story of Barry Minkow, a charismatic teenager, turned business man, who became the youngest person ever to defraud Wall Street.
2018.  Stars: Justin Baldoni, Armand Assante, Talia Shire, Mark Hamill, James Caan
